results.definition: turn on or around an axis or a center
examples: The lamb roast rotates on a spit over the fire

results.definition: cause to turn on an axis or center

examples: ballet dancers can rotate their legs out by 90 degrees
We rotate the lead soprano every night

results.definition: perform a job or duty on a rotating basis
examples: Interns have to rotate for a few months

results.definition: plant or grow in a fixed cyclic order of succession
examples: We rotate the crops so as to maximize the use of the soil
